title: The Big Bang
desc: Broke and low on options, Earn seeks to enter the music industry, by offering to be a manager for his rapper cousin, Paper Boi.

title: Streets on Lock
desc: Earn awaits bail after the boys get arrested for their shooting incident.

title: Go for Broke
desc: Earn takes Van on a date, still broke. Paper Boi and Darius meet up with a group of thugs for a deal.

title: The Streisand Effect
desc: When a blogger begins trashing Paper Boi online, he decides to hunt down the blogger. Darius helps Earn look for a way to make big money fast.

title: Nobody Beats the Biebs
desc: Paper Boi attends a celebrity event for the youth and is outwitted by a more famous hip hop artist. Earn faces a case of mistaken identity. Darius runs into trouble at the shooting range.

title: Value
desc: When Van meets up with an old friend, things don't go well for her and a sticky situation puts her job on the line.

title: B.A.N.
desc: Paper Boi appears on Montague as a guest and must put up with a tedious interview.

title: The Club
desc: Earn, Paper Boi, and Darius attend the Primal Night Club. Paper Boi cannot contend with a popular NBA player who is drawing more people toward him. Earn tails an evasive club owner who owes him money.

title: Juneteenth
desc: Earn and Van attend a Juneteenth party hosted by a wealthy couple and meet some unusual characters.

title: The Jacket
desc: Earn wakes up from a night of partying and goes on a quest to find his navy blue bomber jacket.

title: Alligator Man
desc: As "Robbin' Season" dawns on Atlanta, things escalate when Earn and Darius pay a visit to Earn's uncle, "The Alligator Man."

title: Sportin' Waves
desc: Things feel a little different back in the city at the beginning of Robbin' Season. Al and Darius have become mysteriously distant, while Tracy provides Earn with another way to make some extra cash while Tracy also prepares for his interview.

title: Money Bag Shawty
desc: Earn struggles to shake his "broke" persona while Al and Darius pay a visit to Clark County.

title: Helen
desc: Earn discovers just how weird white people can be when he accompanies Van to a traditional German festival she frequented as a kid.

title: Barbershop
desc: Al runs into a series of obstacles while trying to get his hair cut.

title: Teddy Perkins
desc: When Darius goes to pick up a piano, he meets Teddy Perkins, a strange, eccentric man who makes him feel uneasy.

title: Champagne Papi
desc: Van and her friends go to Drake's NYE party hoping to meet him, but things don't go as planned.

title: Woods
desc: After getting into an argument with his girlfriend, Paper Boi storms off, gets mugged, gets lost in the woods, and meets a creepy old man who won't stop following and taunting him.

title: North of the Border
desc: Paper Boi is quick to regret his decision to play a show at a college campus that Earn arranged.

title: FUBU
desc: A flashback to Earn and Al's adolescence, where the authenticity of Earn's shirt is embarrassingly called into question at school.

title: Crabs in a Barrel
desc: Earn, Alfred and Darius get ready to go on tour in Europe.
